I have extreme measures/ways to prevent piracy once and for all, but I ain't proposing them to these companies because I don't think they have the complete rights to ban all sort of piracy activities. It doesn't matter how hard they try preventing piracy, in the end, piracy wins. When there's a method of prevention, there's always a way of breaking the protection. I'm proud of what the RaZor and Reloaded team are doing, reverse engineering and hell yea, making working file/files which can be used as an alternative to real cd copies. 

My point is, when people are wealthy enough, they would drive/walk themself to shops and grab the cd, I'm a fan of both hard and soft copy of games, I just don't feel secured having to know that my hard copy might be damaged under any circumstances without a working soft copy to make it up. I welcome all sort of protection, but my words would be the same, that it's going to be cracked sooner or later.

For all of you that still can't get it to work:

1. Apply the 3 cracks (the same that are in all AC2 CloneDVD torrents)

2. Run "AssassinsCreedIIGame.exe" (otherwise you'll replace crack by updating ubilauncher) - I always run it as administrator just to be sure, but I think it doesn't matter.

3. Make sure you enable offline saving - click the gear icon next to minimize icon when it's logging in.

4. Start new session and wait at the animus's white screen at least for a few seconds.
